title: Kameron Hurley - The Mirror Empire (Worldbreaker Saga #1)

Worldbreaker Saga (Book 1) The Mirror Empire [2014]

On the eve of a recurring catastrophic event known to extinguish nations and reshape continents, a troubled orphan evades death and slavery to uncover her own bloody pastÃ¢â‚¬Â¦ while a world goes to war with itself.

As the dark star of the cataclysm rises, an illegitimate ruler is tasked with holding together a country fractured by civil war, a precocious young fighter is asked to betray his family and a half-Dhai general must choose between the eradication of her fatherÃ¢â‚¬â„¢s people or loyalty to her alien Empress.

Through tense alliances and devastating betrayal, the Dhai and their allies attempt to hold against a seemingly unstoppable force as enemy nations prepare for a coming together of worlds as old as the universe itself.

In the end, one world will rise Ã¢â‚¬â€œ and many will perish.
